achievement.title: Millimeter
achievement.description: Complete 12 normal levels

achievement.title: Centimeter
achievement.description: Complete 24 normal levels

achievement.title: Decimeter
achievement.description: Complete 36 normal levels

achievement.title: Meter
achievement.description: Complete 45 normal levels

achievement.title: Kilometer
achievement.description: Complete all normal levels

achievement.title: Decameter
achievement.description: Complete all bonus levels

achievement.title: Hectometer
achievement.description: Complete all extended levels

achievement.title: Rainbow
achievement.description: Collect all prisms in the normal levels

achievement.title: Double Rainbow
achievement.description: Collect all prisms in the game

achievement.title: Microsecond
achievement.description: Get 10 seconds of EDGE time as a mini cube

achievement.title: Second
achievement.description: Get 10 seconds of EDGE time

achievement.title: Minute
achievement.description: Get 30 seconds of EDGE time

achievement.title: Hour
achievement.description: Get 60 seconds of EDGE time

achievement.title: Hitchhike
achievement.description: Get 30 seconds of EDGE time on a moving platform

achievement.title: Daredevil
achievement.description: Get more than 0.5 seconds of EDGE time on the active side of a bumper

achievement.title: Balance
achievement.description: Balance on the floor for at least 5 seconds

achievement.title: Backpack
achievement.description: Get at least 8 seconds of EDGE time on the human figure in "edge time"

achievement.title: Dropoff
achievement.description: Get dropped off by a platform and continue hanging on the wall

achievement.title: Pickup
achievement.description: Get picked up by a platform while hanging on an edge

achievement.title: Roundtrip
achievement.description: Get picked up by a platform and then dropped off by a platform

achievement.title: Edgaholic
achievement.description: Finish a level by getting EDGE time on every edge climbed

achievement.title: Long Fall
achievement.description: Fall more than 16 meters and survive

achievement.title: Compact
achievement.description: Get crushed 10 times

achievement.title: Snowblind
achievement.description: Find the six hidden switches in the snow-covered levels in December

achievement.title: Colorblind
achievement.description: Finish a level without collecting any prisms

achievement.title: Pinhole
achievement.description: Finish a level in mini form

achievement.title: A-list
achievement.description: Get an A rank on all normal levels

achievement.title: Stardom
achievement.description: Get an S+ rank on all normal levels

achievement.title: Invader
achievement.description: Get on top of an invader

achievement.title: An enemy of my enemy
achievement.description: Cross the block-enemy section in "cube invaders" without activating any of the three bridges

achievement.title: Subway
achievement.description: Ride the complete subway track

achievement.title: Quick response
achievement.description: Find the QR code

achievement.title: Tumbling travels
achievement.description: Grab the prism after the wall sequence in "higher" as mini cube

achievement.title: Perfect landing
achievement.description: Fall directly on the exit square in "star castle"

achievement.title: Jumper
achievement.description: Jump on top of a car in "peripherique"

achievement.title: Turnstile jumper
achievement.description: Evade the subway fare

achievement.title: Chicken
achievement.description: Find Toki Tori

achievement.title: Nailed it
achievement.description: Get to the exit of "hammer" fast

achievement.title: Monkey
achievement.description: Unleash the nibbling totem monkey head in "babylonian"

achievement.title: Mythical bird
achievement.description: Summon the mythical bird in "mystic"

achievement.title: Shuffled
achievement.description: Get shuffled in "magic"

achievement.title: Stubborn
achievement.description: Press the first nine switches in "don't click!" and finish the level

achievement.title: Hard wired
achievement.description: Don't skip any of the moving wires in "wire"

achievement.title: Hitchup
achievement.description: Escape the clutch of the elevator in "star dust" and get across

achievement.title: Minimalist
achievement.description: Use only one of the nine switches at the end of "click"

achievement.title: Flag
achievement.description: Climb the flag in "highest flag"

achievement.title: Leap of faith
achievement.description: Take a leap of faith
